bio.tool description: MaAsLin2 is comprehensive R package for efficiently determining multivariable association between phenotypes, environments, exposures, covariates and microbial metaâ€™omic features. MaAsLin2 relies on general linear models to accommodate most modern epidemiological study designs, including cross-sectional and longitudinal, and offers a variety of data exploration, normalization, and transformation methods.
